      • rmEdge

        public void rmEdge(int i,
                   int j,
                   boolean bothWays)
        Remove the edge from i to j with bothWays parameter (and j to i if this graph is non-oriented)
        Parameters:
        bothWays - if true, j-i edge is also removed
